Standing_PAD.synopsis: Launched when player interacts with an item with one of the following root templates.DEC_GEN_StuffedBear_Standing_A_f8d74269-6a5c-461e-8907-2e1a7b18e1caDEC_GEN_StuffedBear_Standing_B_8177353f-5beb-4120-85ec-a4fa261795aeDEC_GEN_StuffedBear_Standing_C_d760ca77-927c-4880-98a2-991926cdd2a3 First a skill check roll is done, then the AD is launched. Global flag GLO_TemplateUseSkillCheck_StuffedBear_Success can be used to check if the roll was successful
Standing_PAD.how_to_trigger: Teleport to any of the stuffedbear_standing in the recon command and click on it.

Standing_PAD_0.text: A tragedy. One of nature's creations, slain for vanity.
